title: Understanding SQL Syntax
text: In SQL, table names and column names are case-sensitive and should be enclosed in backticks (`) if they contain spaces or special characters.

title: Common SQL Mistakes
text: A common mistake in SQL is not enclosing table names with spaces in backticks (`). This can lead to syntax errors.

title: Identifying the Mistake
text: Which SQL query demonstrates a common mistake?
choices: DELETE FROM Accounts WHERE AccountID IS NULL;
